com.i2group.apollo.client

Interface IDelpsServiceFacade


  • public interface IDelpsServiceFacade
    A set of methods for interacting with an i2 Analyze DELPS (data load ELP stage) solution, including the ability to synchronize Items in the ELP stage with changing data in an external source.
    Since:
    5.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createOrReplaceItems(Source xmlSource)
      Creates Items from the platform-compatible XML in the specified Source, and then adds or replaces them in the item store of an ELP stage.
      void deleteItems(List<String> itemKeys)
      Deletes the Items with ItemIdentifiers that contain the specified String keys from the item store of an ELP stage.
      void purgeItems(List<String> itemKeys)
      Purges the Items with ItemIdentifiers that contain the specified String keys from the item store of an ELP stage.

    • Method Detail

      • createOrReplaceItems

        void createOrReplaceItems(Source xmlSource)
                   throws ElpStageUnavailableException,
                          ValidationException
        Creates Items from the platform-compatible XML in the specified Source, and then adds or replaces them in the item store of an ELP stage.

        If the identifier of a created Item matches the identifier of an Item that is already in the store, then the cards on the created Item replace the cards on the existing Item.

        Parameters:
        xmlSource - A Source that contains platform-compatible XML.

        The XML in xmlSource must contain information for a consistent set of Items. That is, if the XML describes a link, then it must also describe the ends of that link.

        If the external data source supports multiple cards, then the XML in xmlSource must specify a unique identifier for each card. Otherwise, the XML can use the same identifier for both the item and the card.

        Throws:
        ElpStageUnavailableException - If the ELP stage that is associated with this IDelpsServiceFacade fails to add or replace the Items.
        ValidationException - If the XML in xmlSource cannot be converted into Items, or the ELP stage that is associated with this IDelpsServiceFacade does not exist.

      • deleteItems

        void deleteItems(List<String> itemKeys)
          throws ElpStageUnavailableException,
                 ValidationException,
                 ItemNotFoundException
        Deletes the Items with ItemIdentifiers that contain the specified String keys from the item store of an ELP stage.
        Parameters:
        itemKeys - Strings containing the keys from the ItemIdentifiers of the Items to delete.
        Throws:
        ElpStageUnavailableException - If the ELP stage that is associated with this IDelpsServiceFacade fails to delete the Items.
        ValidationException - If the ELP stage that is associated with this IDelpsServiceFacade does not exist.
        ItemNotFoundException - If one of the Items is not found in the ELP stage that is associated with this IDelpsServiceFacade.

      • purgeItems

        void purgeItems(List<String> itemKeys)
         throws ElpStageUnavailableException,
                ValidationException,
                ItemNotFoundException
        Purges the Items with ItemIdentifiers that contain the specified String keys from the item store of an ELP stage.
        Parameters:
        itemKeys - Strings containing the keys from the ItemIdentifiers of the Items to purge.
        Throws:
        ElpStageUnavailableException - If the ELP stage that is associated with this IDelpsServiceFacade fails to purge the Items.
        ValidationException - If the ELP stage that is associated with this IDelpsServiceFacade does not exist.
        ItemNotFoundException - If one of the Items is not found in the ELP stage that is associated with this IDelpsServiceFacade.
